      • homepage

        public int homepage()

        Title: homepage

        Description: The homepage of the system, in main method it will present in endless loop.

        返回:

      • register

        public void register()
              throws java.text.ParseException,
                     java.io.IOException

        Title: register

        Description: User enters name, address, date of birth to register

        抛出:
        java.text.ParseException
        java.io.IOException

      • Login

        public Customer Login()
               throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                      java.io.IOException

        Title: Login

        Description: After user registers, enter user's name to login the system.

        返回:
        customer object whose name is as same as you entered
        抛出:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • AddAccount

        public void AddAccount(Customer c)
                throws java.io.IOException

        Title: AddAccount

        Description: User create account from 3 choices:current,saver,junior account and add this account into the arraylist in customer object

        参数:
        c - customer object which is going to create account
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • checkAccList

        public int checkAccList(Customer c)
                 throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException

        Title: checkAccList

        Description: List all of a user's account

        参数:
        c - customer who is going to check account list
        返回:
        the number of account user want to check in detail
        抛出:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • check1Acc

        public void check1Acc(int i,
                      Customer c)
               throws java.io.IOException

        Title: check1Acc

        Description: present detail of one specific account

        参数:
        i - the number of account the user is going to check
        c - customer who is going to check the account
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • depositMoney

        public Account depositMoney(Account a)

        Title: depositMoney

        Description: Deposit money from account after entering amount of money and way of payment

        参数:
        a - account which is going to deposit money
        返回:
        account which has stored the deposit record

      • withdrawalMoney

        public Account withdrawalMoney(Account a)

        Title: withdrawalMoney

        Description: Withdrawal money by entering the amount of money

        参数:
        a - account which is going to withdrawal money
        返回:
        account which has stored the withdrawal record

      • checkTransList

        public Account checkTransList(Account a)

        Title: checkTransList

        Description: List all the transaction records in detail and clear funds

        参数:
        a - account which is going to check transaction records
        返回:
        account which has been refreshed

                 throws java.text.ParseException,
